rules_text: {2}{W}, Provision: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Oh, let ‘im run free. He'll come back, and if he doesn't, then he wasn't your horse anyway.”
—Marshal “Hawkeye” Hayes[/i]
